Description:
Conduct market research to identify customer needs, industry trends, and competitive landscape. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (including R&D, marketing, and sales) to develop and refine product strategies.
Define product specifications, features, and pricing strategies.
Oversee product development, from concept to launch, ensuring products meet quality and performance standards.
Monitor product performance and gather feedback for continuous improvement.
Business Development: Identify and evaluate new business opportunities, partnerships, and potential markets.
Develop and execute business development strategies to expand the company's reach and revenue streams.
Negotiate and establish partnerships, licensing agreements, and distribution channels.
Analyze market trends and competition to make informed business decisions. Create and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and clients.Skills
Skills:
Resident Location : EP
4+ years of experience in product management, business development, or a similar role.
Fluent in English.
MS office works required.
Knowledge and experience in obtaining certificates and compliance for products, plants, or items required for sales projects.
Familiarity with regulatory standards and certification processes relevant to the industry.
Experience in coordinating and obtaining necessary certifications, licenses, permits, or approvals for products or plants.
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
Proven experience in product management or business development.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Self-motivated with a results-driven mindset.
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Knowledge of market research and data analysis techniques.
Familiarity with the latest trends and technologies in the industry.
Experience in the Saudi Arabian market is a plus.
